title: STK San Juan location in Condado district
statement: STK San Juan is set along Ashford Avenue in Condado, surrounded by oceanfront resorts, nightlife, and casinos.

citations.quote: Set along Ashford Avenue in Condado, STK San Juan brings a modern steakhouse and chic lounge to one of San Juan's most walkable beachfront districts, surrounded by oceanfront resorts, nightlife, and casinos.
